contexts.context: ...the only skill he seemed to be well-suited for: <mark>gardening</mark>. In time, he had grown an impressive garden of...
...for: gardening. In time, he had grown an impressive <mark>garden</mark> of willow anther, gold kanet, chokeweed, white bloatroot...
...grown himself into a remarkably uninteresting man -- aside from his <mark>gardening</mark>, he had little to say for himself. Unlearned, uncharismatic...
As he tended his <mark>garden</mark> one springtide, not very many years ago, he heard...
...greedy thieves, the children of Veloth will build anew a <mark>garden</mark> of plenty in this blighted wasteland. Come to Red Mountain...
